author: francescobrivio
body:
#### PR description:
Combined backport of:
- #47418: move unit test for `onlinebeammonitor_dqm_sourceclient-live` to use streamer files
- #47430: `DQMStreamerReader`: re-throw all exceptions when run in unit test mode

FYI @mmusich

#### PR validation:
This needs a backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/9718 to `IB/CMSSW_15_0_X/master/` @smuzaffar should I take care of preparing it?

#### Backport:
Combined backport of #47418 and #47430
title: [15_0_X] Combined backport of #47430 and #47418
